info.name: GitHub merge tracker
info.summary: Track merged pull requests in GitHub repositories.
info.description:
Allows admins to specify a GitHub repository that should be watched, all newly merged pull requests will then be added to a review list and can be marked as resolved by users.
After installing this app it is required to configure the following two configuration flags in your config.php file:
- github.client_id - github.client_secret
You have to use valid data from https://github.com/settings/developers.
info.author: Lukas Reschke
